content:
I've added the yoga class to your schedule. Here's the revised template:

**Week 1 (March 13-19)**

* Saturday, March 15: Yoga (morning)
* Sunday, March 14: Zumba (morning)
* Monday, March 16: Kickboxing (6:00 pm)
* Tuesday, March 17: Yoga (6:30 pm)
* Thursday, March 19: Yoga (evening)

**Week 2 (March 20-26)**

* Saturday, March 21: Pilates (morning)
* Sunday, March 22: Zumba (morning)
* Monday, March 23: Kickboxing (6:00 pm)
* Tuesday, March 24: Yoga (6:30 pm)
* Wednesday, March 25: Yoga (evening)
* Friday, March 27: Pilates (evening)

**Week 3 (March 27-April 2)**

* Saturday, March 28: Yoga (morning)
* Sunday, March 29: Zumba (morning)
* Monday, March 30: Kickboxing (6:00 pm)
* Tuesday, March 31: Yoga (6:30 pm)
* Thursday, April 1: Yoga (evening)

**Week 4 (April 3-9)**

* Saturday, April 4: Pilates (morning)
* Sunday, April 5: Zumba (morning)
* Monday, April 6: Kickboxing (6:00 pm)
* Tuesday, April 7: Yoga (6:30 pm)
* Thursday, April 9: Pilates (evening)

I've added the yoga class on Tuesdays at 6:30 pm to your schedule. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to add or change!
